timeline.bodyText: maybe open for discussion: return null only if he source is null and exception for the rest of params that should not be null?
timeline.author: aleksmaus

replies.bodyText: Sound good. Looks like another pattern that could be extracted/reused depending on which way we want to proceed with null handling for consistency between all functions.
replies.author: aleksmaus

timeline.bodyText:
nit: just a suggestion maybe extract the function to avoid repetition, for example:
https://github.com/elastic/elasticsearch/pull/54380/files#diff-5ad1821091fb7e7473cbdfdded44fbcbR52
timeline.author: aleksmaus

replies.bodyText: I believe that, at one point after all these string functions are done, we need to refactor them and extract some common code in a base class, if possible of course.
replies.author: astefan

timeline.bodyText: should include the pattern in both equals and hashCode?
timeline.author: aleksmaus
